price: Maka siapakah yang lebih zalim daripada orang yang mengada-adakan kedustaan terhadap Allah atau mendustakan ayat-ayat-Nya? Sesungguhnya, tiadalah beruntung orang-orang yang berbuat dosa.
arabic: فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biāyātihi innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-muj'rimūna
